div.p:
Implemented features fall into three categories :
Netbeans project and Maven project synchronization
Maven Executor
POM Editor

ul.li: Dependencies - mounting all dependency jars, to allow Netbeans code completion and other features.
Mounting of source and resource directories
Unite all the features into complete creation of a netbeans project according to the POM
Executing Maven goals or goal sequences from within the IDE.
List of all available goals - plugins defined ones as well as custom ones
